title: Hedy Lammar - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/29/18
itunes:title: Hedy Lammar - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/29/18
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and author Bill Birnes explore the story of Hedy Lammar, a famed Hollywood actress who was also a skilled inventor and even helped Howard Hughes create a new wing design for his airplanes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
